src_original: Vin_2.2682 / āstaram atra dadyāt* vālukācchayikā vā /  Vin_2.2683 / kāle caitat kālaṃ śocayet* /  Vin_2.2684 / dharmaśravaṇaṃ [40b6] kuryuḥ niśāyām* /  Vin_2.2685 / aṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāñ ca /  Vin_2.2686 / naitad akaraṇe glānasya doṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 若八日十四日十五日，不病，應集一處說法。
若打揵稚，上座前行前坐。

src_original: Vin_2.2695 / na tato dharmaśravaṇam utsṛjyeyuḥ /  Vin_2.2696 / muhūrttaṃ sthaviro gregataṃ tūṣṇīm āga yyātra dharmaṃ bhāṣetānyam vādhīcched vada bhikṣo dharmaṃ
tgt_original: 須臾默然已，當自說法。 若自不能，當使餘比丘說。

src_original: Vin_2.2697 / bhāṣamāṇam avadhārya dharmaś ced utsāhayet* /
Vin_2.2698 / na ced dhārayet* /  Vin_2.2699 / gṛhiṇām a[41a2]trāgatānāṃ dharmaṃ kathaṃ kuryāt* /
tgt_original: 若外道來，為說法攝取，至心說，不以自大自高。
